Package com.facetec.sdk

Class FaceTecOCRConfirmationCustomization

java.lang.Object
com.facetec.sdk.FaceTecOCRConfirmationCustomization
public final class FaceTecOCRConfirmationCustomization extends Object
Customize the User OCR Confirmation Screen.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    int
    backgroundColors
    Color of the User OCR Confirmation Screen background.
    This accepts a color or drawable resource id.
    Default is white.
    int
    buttonBackgroundDisabledColor
    Color of the action button's background when the button is disabled during the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    Default is custom color.
    int
    buttonBackgroundHighlightColor
    Color of the action button's background when the button is pressed during the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    Default is custom color.
    int
    buttonBackgroundNormalColor
    Color of the action button's background during the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    Default is custom color.
    int
    buttonBorderColor
    Color of the action button's border during the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    Default is transparent.

    Thickness of the action button's border during theUser OCR Confirmation Screen.

    buttonCornerRadius
    Corner radius of the action button's border during the User OCR Confirmation Screen.

    android.graphics.Typeface
    buttonFont
    Font of the action button's text during the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    If this value is null, FaceTec's default Typeface will be used.
    Default is null.
    int
    buttonTextDisabledColor
    Color of the action button's text when the button is disabled during the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    Default is white.
    int
    buttonTextHighlightColor
    Color of the action button's text when the button is pressed during the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    Default is white.
    int
    buttonTextNormalColor
    Color of the action button's text during the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    Default is white.
    int
    customScrollIndicatorAnimation
    Configure an animated vector drawable to display on the scroll indicator on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    Note: All resources required for the vector drawable animation needs to be included in your app's res directory before launching.
    Note: The animation is displayed indefinitely while waiting for user interaction, so the custom animation should be set to loop/repeat infinitely.
    boolean
    enableFixedConfirmButton
    Control whether to place the User OCR Confirmation Screen action button at the bottom of the scrollable content, or fixed to the bottom of the screen (always visible).
    Default is false (button is below the scrollable content).
    boolean
    enableScrollIndicator
    Control whether to show the scroll indicator on the User OCR Confirmation Screen when there is scrollable content.
    Default is true (enabled).
    boolean
    enableScrollIndicatorTextAnimation
    Control whether to animate the text of the scroll indicator on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    Default is true (enabled).
    android.graphics.Typeface
    fieldLabelFont
    Font of the field labels' text on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    If this value is null, FaceTec's default Typeface will be used.
    int
    fieldLabelTextColor
    Color of the field labels' text on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    Default is off-black.
    android.graphics.Typeface
    fieldValueFont
    Font of the field values' text on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    If this value is null, FaceTec's default Typeface will be used.
    int
    fieldValueTextColor
    Color of the field values' text on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    Default is off-black.
    int
    inputFieldBackgroundColor
    Color of the input fields' backgrounds on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    Default is transparent.
    int
    inputFieldBorderColor
    Color of the input fields' borders on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    Default is off-black.
    int
    inputFieldBorderWidth
    Thickness of the input fields' borders on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    This value is calculated in density/device-independent pixels (i.e.
    int
    inputFieldCornerRadius
    Corner radius of the input fields' borders on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    This value is calculated in density/device-independent pixels (i.e.
    android.graphics.Typeface
    inputFieldFont
    Font of the input fields' text on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    If this value is null, the value configured for .fieldValueFont will be used.
    Default is null.
    android.graphics.Typeface
    inputFieldPlaceholderFont
    Font of the input fields' placeholder text on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    If this value is null, the value configured for .inputFieldFont will be used unless that value is null, in which case the value configured for .fieldValueFont will be used.
    Default is null.
    int
    inputFieldPlaceholderTextColor
    Color of the input fields' placeholder text on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    If this value is 0 (transparent), the value configured for .inputFieldTextColor will be used with a 0.4 alpha component unless that value is 0 (transparent), in which case the value configured for .fieldValueFont will be used with a 0.4 alpha component.
    Default is 0 (transparent).
    int
    inputFieldTextColor
    Color of the input fields' text on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    If this value is 0 (transparent), the value configured for .fieldValueTextColor will be used.
    Default is 0 (transparent).
    int
    mainHeaderDividerLineColor
    Color of the line below the main header on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    Default is custom color.
    int
    mainHeaderDividerLineWidth
    Thickness of the line below the main header on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    This value is calculated in density/device-independent pixels (i.e.
    android.graphics.Typeface

    Font of the the main header text on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    If this value is null, FaceTec's default Typeface will be used.
    Default is null.

    Color of the main header text on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.

    android.graphics.Typeface
    scrollIndicatorFont
    Font of the scroll indicator's text on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    If this value is null, FaceTec's default Typeface will be used.
    Default is null.
    int
    scrollIndicatorForegroundHighlightColor
    Color of the scroll indicator's text and default image tint when the button is pressed during the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    Default is white.
    int
    scrollIndicatorForegroundNormalColor
    Color of the scroll indicator's text and default image tint during the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    Default is white.
    android.graphics.Typeface
    sectionHeaderFont
    Font of the section headers' text on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    If this value is null, FaceTec's default Typeface will be used.
    Default is null.
    int
    sectionHeaderTextColor
    Color of the section headers' text on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    Default is off-black.
    boolean
    showInputFieldBottomBorderOnly
    Control whether the input fields' borders are only displayed along the bottom bounds, or if they are displayed as a full box around the input fields on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    Default is false (showing full border box around input fields).
    boolean
    showScrollIndicatorImage
    Control whether to show the animate-able image on the scroll indicator on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
    Default is true (shown).

      public int backgroundColors
      Color of the User OCR Confirmation Screen background.
      This accepts a color or drawable resource id.

    • mainHeaderDividerLineColor

      public int mainHeaderDividerLineColor
      Color of the line below the main header on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
      Default is custom color.

    • mainHeaderDividerLineWidth

      public int mainHeaderDividerLineWidth
      Thickness of the line below the main header on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
      This value is calculated in density/device-independent pixels (i.e. TypedValue.COMPLEX_UNIT_DIP).
      Default is dynamically configured per device at runtime.

    • mainHeaderFont

      public android.graphics.Typeface mainHeaderFont
      Font of the the main header text on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
      If this value is null, FaceTec's default Typeface will be used.
      Default is null.

      Color of the main header text on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
      Default is custom color.

      public int inputFieldBorderColor
      Color of the input fields' borders on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
      Default is off-black.

    • inputFieldBorderWidth

      public int inputFieldBorderWidth
      Thickness of the input fields' borders on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
      This value is calculated in density/device-independent pixels (i.e. TypedValue.COMPLEX_UNIT_DIP).
      Default is dynamically configured per device at runtime.

    • inputFieldCornerRadius

      public int inputFieldCornerRadius
      Corner radius of the input fields' borders on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
      This value is calculated in density/device-independent pixels (i.e. TypedValue.COMPLEX_UNIT_DIP).
      Default is dynamically configured per device at runtime.

    • inputFieldPlaceholderFont

      public android.graphics.Typeface inputFieldPlaceholderFont
      Font of the input fields' placeholder text on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
      If this value is null, the value configured for .inputFieldFont will be used unless that value is null, in which case the value configured for .fieldValueFont will be used.
      Default is null.

    • inputFieldPlaceholderTextColor

      public int inputFieldPlaceholderTextColor
      Color of the input fields' placeholder text on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
      If this value is 0 (transparent), the value configured for .inputFieldTextColor will be used with a 0.4 alpha component unless that value is 0 (transparent), in which case the value configured for .fieldValueFont will be used with a 0.4 alpha component.
      Default is 0 (transparent).

    • showInputFieldBottomBorderOnly

      public boolean showInputFieldBottomBorderOnly
      Control whether the input fields' borders are only displayed along the bottom bounds, or if they are displayed as a full box around the input fields on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
      Default is false (showing full border box around input fields).

      Default is dynamically configured per device at runtime.

      public int buttonCornerRadius

      This value is calculated in density/device-independent pixels (i.e. TypedValue.COMPLEX_UNIT_DIP).
      Default is dynamically configured per device at runtime.

    • scrollIndicatorBackgroundNormalColor

      public int scrollIndicatorBackgroundNormalColor
      Color of the scroll indicator's background during the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
      Default is custom color.

    • scrollIndicatorBackgroundHighlightColor

      public int scrollIndicatorBackgroundHighlightColor
      Color of the scroll indicator's background when the button is pressed during the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
      Default is custom color.

    • scrollIndicatorForegroundNormalColor

      public int scrollIndicatorForegroundNormalColor
      Color of the scroll indicator's text and default image tint during the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
      Default is white.

    • scrollIndicatorForegroundHighlightColor

      public int scrollIndicatorForegroundHighlightColor
      Color of the scroll indicator's text and default image tint when the button is pressed during the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
      Default is white.

    • scrollIndicatorBorderColor

      public int scrollIndicatorBorderColor
      Color of the scroll indicator's border during the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
      Default is transparent.

    • scrollIndicatorBorderWidth

      public int scrollIndicatorBorderWidth
      Thickness of the scroll indicator's border during theUser OCR Confirmation Screen.
      This value is calculated in density/device-independent pixels (i.e. TypedValue.COMPLEX_UNIT_DIP).
      Default is dynamically configured per device at runtime.

    • scrollIndicatorCornerRadius

      public int scrollIndicatorCornerRadius
      Corner radius of the scroll indicator's border on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
      This value is calculated in density/device-independent pixels (i.e. TypedValue.COMPLEX_UNIT_DIP).
      If this value is set to -1, the corner radius will be set to half the height of the scroll indicator.
      Default is -1.

    • scrollIndicatorFont

      public android.graphics.Typeface scrollIndicatorFont
      Font of the scroll indicator's text on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
      If this value is null, FaceTec's default Typeface will be used.
      Default is null.

    • customScrollIndicatorAnimation

      @DrawableRes public int customScrollIndicatorAnimation
      Configure an animated vector drawable to display on the scroll indicator on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
      Note: All resources required for the vector drawable animation needs to be included in your app's res directory before launching.
      Note: The animation is displayed indefinitely while waiting for user interaction, so the custom animation should be set to loop/repeat infinitely. If the animation ends before the scroll indicator is dismissed, the animation will be restarted.
      If this is set to an animated vector drawable, the drawable supplied will be used instead of the default animation.
      If this is 0, the default animation will be used.
      Default is 0.

    • scrollIndicatorElevation

      public int scrollIndicatorElevation
      Elevation of the scroll indicator from the User OCR Confirmation Screen background.
      This value is calculated in density/device-independent pixels (i.e. TypedValue.COMPLEX_UNIT_DIP).
      Default is 10.

    • enableScrollIndicator

      public boolean enableScrollIndicator
      Control whether to show the scroll indicator on the User OCR Confirmation Screen when there is scrollable content.
      Default is true (enabled).

    • enableScrollIndicatorTextAnimation

      public boolean enableScrollIndicatorTextAnimation
      Control whether to animate the text of the scroll indicator on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
      Default is true (enabled).

    • enableFixedConfirmButton

      public boolean enableFixedConfirmButton
      Control whether to place the User OCR Confirmation Screen action button at the bottom of the scrollable content, or fixed to the bottom of the screen (always visible).
      Default is false (button is below the scrollable content).

    • showScrollIndicatorImage

      public boolean showScrollIndicatorImage
      Control whether to show the animate-able image on the scroll indicator on the User OCR Confirmation Screen.
      Default is true (shown).
